features: Exceptional 2.0 Channel HiFi Sound: Experience rich, full-range stereo sound with a True 50W RMS output, offering crystal-clear audio for music, movies, and games.
Advanced Wireless Streaming with BT 5.3: Enjoy seamless, high-quality wireless connectivity with a 10M range, ensuring stable and fast audio streaming from compatible devices.
Multiple Input Options for Versatility: Features BT 5.3, RCA, Optical, HDMI(ARC), USB, and SUB OUT inputs, allowing you to connect effortlessly to various devices and audio systems.
Built-In Power Amplifier: The integrated amplifier enhances sound performance, delivering powerful and balanced audio without the need for additional equipment.
Dynamic Audio Modes with DSP: Choose from Movie, Music, or News modes to customize your listening experience based on your content.

Customizable Bass, Treble, and Volume with Wide Frequency Range: : Adjust the audio to your preference with simple controls for bass, treble, and volume, ensuring personalized sound. With a frequency range of 45Hz to 20kHz, the speakers deliver deep bass, crisp mids, and clear highs for a balanced audio experience.
Premium Build Quality: Constructed with MDF and fabric cloth, the speakers minimize vibration and distortion, delivering pure and accurate sound reproduction.
Compact and Elegant Design: Measuring just 175x155x248mm, the sleek, modern look of the Roxel Soleil complements any room or decor.
Comprehensive Accessories Included: Comes with a UKCA adapter, remote control, 3.5mm to 2RCA cable, 3M L/R connection wire, and AAA batteries for a complete setup.

Kevlar cone speakers : Kevlar speakers are renowned for their exceptional durability and acoustic performance. Kevlar, a high-strength synthetic fiber, is used as the primary material for the speaker cone due to its unique combination of rigidity and flexibility. This allows the cone to withstand the stress of rapid movement without distorting or breaking, ensuring a consistent and accurate sound reproduction.

With 50W RMS output , these HiFi speakers deliver rich, full-range sound, making them ideal for music, movies, and gaming. Roxel Eclipse offers a premium audio experience with stunning aesthetics Measuring just 175x155x248mm, the sleek, modern look of the Roxel Soleil complements any room or decor, while delivering room-filling sound. Perfect for bookshelves, desks, or home theaters while still delivering room-filling audio. Customizable Audio Easily adjust your sound with side-mounted bass, treble, and volume control knobs to suit your preferences and enhance your listening experience. Pre-Set EQ options are also available from the Roxel Soleil remote controller. Kevlar Cone Speakers with Built in Amplifier Kevlar cone speakers are renowned for their exceptional durability and acoustic performance. Kevlar, a high-strength synthetic fiber, is used as the primary material for the speaker cone due to its unique combination of rigidity and flexibility. Wooden Case Durable Built EXCEPTIONAL SOUND QUALITY Constructed with wooden material and fabric cloth, the speakers minimize vibration and distortion, delivering pure and accurate sound reproduction. Roxel Soleil produce HiFi stereo sound with rich bass, clear mids, and crisp highs, making them ideal for music, movies, and gaming enthusiasts Designed to impress...
